itinerary.mapNote: Longtong Pa start. Milk Lake 4700m. Alpine meadows. 4700m.
Five Colour Lake. Circuit around three sacred peaks. 3800m.

waypoints.name: Chenrezig (Xiannairi)
waypoints.note: Sacred peak of compassion. One of three holy Yading peaks.

waypoints.name: Jambeyang (Yangmaiyong)
waypoints.note: Sacred peak of wisdom. Sharpest of the three.

waypoints.name: Chanadorje (Xianuoduoji)
waypoints.note: Sacred peak of strength. Kora circumnavigates all three.

waypoints.name: Milk Lake (Nailin Hai)
waypoints.note: Turquoise glacial lake. Sacred. Best reflection of Chenrezig.

waypoints.name: Five Colour Lake
waypoints.note: Multi-hued glacial lake. Highest point of kora circuit.
